Package me.mthw.forge.cracker

package me.mthw.forge.cracker

  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    BruteCracker
    The BruteCracker class provides an abstract implementation for a brute-force password cracking mechanism.
    BruteCrackerOffice
    The BruteCrackerOffice class extends the BruteCracker class and provides functionality for brute-forcing passwords for encrypted Office files.
    BruteCrackerPDF
    The `BruteCrackerPDF` class is a specialized implementation of the `BruteCracker` class designed to handle password cracking and decryption for PDF files.
    CrackerControl
    The CrackerControl class is responsible for managing the brute-force cracking process for various file types.
